p: In 2012, middle east respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) infection, which is a fatal disease, has caused panic worldwide because it spread within a short period of time in Saudi Arabia. Interestingly, most fatality cases included patients in the intensive care unit and hemodialysis (HD) unit. [ 1] In 2015, the MERS-CoV outbreak also occurred in South Korea, with 186 confirmed cases and 36 deaths. [ 2] During the outbreak, some dialysis patients in 3 HD units were incidentally exposed to other patients or healthcare workers with confirmed MERS-CoV infection.
